page.title: 03TRANSPORT-LILLESHALL AREA
page.content: There is{no railway}in the area,the nearest being at{Wellington},with good services from{Stafford}and { Wolverhampton}.Only half the people surveyed have been on a train once or twice and 7% not at{all.Regular bus {services}along the main road to {Wellington,Shrewsbury,Stafford}and {Newport}connect to{Birmingham}and {London}.25% of primary children in the area travel to school by bus whereas only 6% of dads go to work by bus.All families have at least one car and it is the main means of transport to work for parents,also half the children surveyed travel to school by car.Almost all children have a bike by the time they are eleven and most parents have bicycles which they use for pleasure.
